lines.text:
[Chasing Carly after she has escaped]
Beautiful bitch!
How could you let this happen to us? Look at this place! They treat us like animals. We are animals!
Carly, you have to hold on to yourself. Mr Cricks is gonna help us that's why he came with me today.
I don't want his help! He didn't help Melanie and he didn't help me. Look at me! I wanted to be a lawyer, because I believed in justice. Ha! That's a laugh. Does this look like justice to you? Oh!
